text: Mara'iyamara putra machiha kerala ejana raachula. Te'omra purbe bahuto raachula atita haiche arau te'omra maka achila atyanta satyabadi. Te'omloka dujane'i khoraa-boraa karaichila. Coraa, ami sihamtara babe ayatasamuha kenekai bistaraitabharae barnana karao, tathapi'o coraa, sihamta kenekai satyabimukha haya
